metadata.title: CVE-2014-9732 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The cabd_extract function in cabd.c in libmspack before 0.5 does notproperly maintain decompression callbacks in certain cases where an invalidfile follows a valid file, which allows remote attackers to cause a denialof service (NULL pointer dereference and application crash) via a craftedCAB archive.

criterions.comment: libmspack: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
cabextract: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
